parameters.name: DocumentNames
parameters.description: Array of the paths and filenames of the non-SOLIDWORKS files to remove from Pack and Go

title: IPackAndGo.RemoveExternalDocuments
description: Removes the specified non-SOLIDWORKS files from Pack and Go.

parameters.name: DocumentNames
parameters.description: Array of the paths and filenames of the non-SOLIDWORKS files to remove from Pack and Go

returns: True if all of the specified non-SOLIDWORKS files are removed from Pack and Go, false if not
remarks: In C# applications, you must wrap the array of objects for the DocumentNames parameter using the .NET Framework BStrWrapper class.
